name: Jhon Doe
review: The chair itself has actually held up very well. The back, arms and tilt function all work perfectly with no signs of wear. It is amazing

name: Adam Chole
review: I was a bit hesitate at first not sure what to expect, but we love it and ordered a second chair. Very comfortable, durable and trendy

name: Jack Ryder
review: I bought this chair for my elderly mother. This chair is big and fluffy. Great for relaxing and cuddles you up in total comfort. Priceless

name: Jhon Smith
review: I bought this for a tight spot, it fit there well and was still comfortable. It was very easy to put together too

name: Shawn Jackson
review: The chair is comfortable. It sits closer to a 90 degree angle than most recliners. Cup holders are convenient

name: Luke Shaw
review: I've had it a littler over a month and I already found a seem at the head rest separating from the back of chair
